verses.verse: Shiggaion of David, which he sang unto Jehovah, concerning the words of Cush a Benjamite. O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, in thee do I take refuge <S%H2620><s%>: Save <S%H3467><s%> me from all them that pursue <S%H7291><s%> me <S%H5337><s%>, and deliver me,
Lest they tear <S%H2963><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> like a lion <S%H738><s%>, Rending it in pieces <S%H6561><s%>, while there is none to deliver <S%H5337><s%>.
O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, if I have done <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H3426><s%>; If there be iniquity <S%H5766><s%> in my hands <S%H3709><s%>;

If I have rewarded <S%H1580><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> unto him that was at peace <S%H7999><s%> with me <S%H2502><s%>; (Yea, I have delivered him that without cause <S%H7387><s%> was mine adversary <S%H6887><s%>;)

Let the enemy <S%H341><s%> pursue <S%H7291><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>, and overtake <S%H5381><s%> it <S%H2416><s%>; Yea, let him tread my life down <S%H7429><s%> to the earth <S%H776><s%>, And lay <S%H7931><s%> my glory <S%H3519><s%> in the dust <S%H6083><s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

Arise <S%H6965><s%>, O Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, in thine anger <S%H639><s%>; Lift up <S%H5375><s%> thyself against the rage <S%H5678><s%> of mine adversaries <S%H6887><s%>, And awake <S%H5782><s%> for me <S%H6680><s%>; thou hast commanded judgment <S%H4941><s%>.
And let the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the peoples <S%H3816><s%> compass thee about <S%H5437><s%>; And over them return <S%H7725><s%> thou on high <S%H4791><s%>.

Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> ministereth judgment <S%H1777><s%> to the peoples <S%H5971><s%>: Judge <S%H8199><s%> me <S%H3068><s%>, O Jehovah, according to my righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, and to mine integrity that is in me <S%H8537><s%>.

O let the wickedness <S%H7451><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> come to an end <S%H1584><s%>, but establish <S%H3559><s%> thou the righteous <S%H6662><s%>: For the righteous <S%H6662><s%> God <S%H430><s%> trieth <S%H974><s%> the minds <S%H3629><s%> and hearts <S%H3826><s%>.
My shield <S%H4043><s%> is with God <S%H430><s%>, Who saveth <S%H3467><s%> the upright <S%H3477><s%> in heart <S%H3820><s%>.
God <S%H430><s%> is a righteous <S%H6662><s%> judge <S%H8199><s%>, Yea <S%H410><s%>, a God that hath indignation <S%H2194><s%> every day <S%H3117><s%>.
If a man turn <S%H7725><s%> not <S%H3913><s%>, he will whet his sword <S%H2719><s%>; He hath bent <S%H1869><s%> his bow <S%H7198><s%>, and made it ready <S%H3559><s%>.
He hath also prepared <S%H3559><s%> for him the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%>; He maketh <S%H6466><s%> his arrows <S%H2671><s%> fiery shafts <S%H1814><s%>.
Behold <S%H2254><s%>, he travaileth with iniquity <S%H205><s%>; Yea <S%H2029><s%>, he hath conceived mischief <S%H5999><s%>, and brought forth <S%H3205><s%> falsehood <S%H8267><s%>.
He hath made <S%H3738><s%> a pit <S%H953><s%>, and digged <S%H2658><s%> it <S%H5307><s%>, And is fallen into the ditch <S%H7845><s%> which he made <S%H6466><s%>.
His mischief <S%H5999><s%> shall return <S%H7725><s%> upon his own head <S%H7218><s%>, And his violence <S%H2555><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%> upon his own pate <S%H6936><s%>.

I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> according to his righteousness <S%H6664><s%>, And will sing praise <S%H2167><s%> to the name <S%H8034><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> Most High <S%H5945><s%>.
